a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of global primary energy consumption by source
Measured as a percentage of direct primary energy. This means that fossil fuels include the energy lost due to
inefficiencies in energy production. Traditional biomass is included.
Data source: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024); Smil (2017)
Note: In the absence of more recent data, traditional biomass is assumed constant since 2015. Other renewables include geothermal, wave
